
### address/page table entry format  {.smaller}

(with POBITS=12, LEVELS=1) []{.my-small} <table>
<tr><td>&nbsp;</td><td>bits 63--21</td><td>bits 20--12</td><td>bits 11--1</td><td>bit 0</td></tr>
<tr><td>\\hline{} page table entry</td><td>\\multicolumn{2c|physical page number}</td><td>unused</td><td>valid bit</td></tr>
<tr><td>\\hline{}  virtual address</td><td>unused</td><td>virtual page number</td><td>\\multicolumn{2cpage offset}</td></tr>
<tr><td>\\hline{} physical address</td><td>\\multicolumn{2c|physical page number}</td><td>\\multicolumn{2cpage offset}</td></tr>
<tr><td>\\hline{}</td></tr>
</table>
 

* in assignment: value from posix_memalign = physical address
